channel.title: CVE Feed for Autodesk -- AutoCAD
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Autodesk -- AutoCAD

item.title: CVE-2024-7305|2024-10-23T16:38:02.033Z -- autodesk -- autocad
item.description: A maliciously crafted DWF file, when parsed in AdDwfPdk.dll through Autodesk AutoCAD, can force an Out-of-Bounds Write. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-7305|2024-08-21T15:25:35.299Z -- autodesk -- autocad
item.description: A maliciously crafted DWF file, when parsed in AdDwfPdk.dll through Autodesk AutoCAD, can force an Out-of-Bounds Write. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.
